author: cnbc.com
title: Aradigm reports 4Q loss
text:
HAYWARD, Calif. (AP) _ Aradigm Corp. (ARDM) on Friday reported a loss of $4.2 million in its fourth quarter.
On a per-share basis, the Hayward, California-based company said it had a loss of 28 cents.
The specialty pharmaceutical company posted revenue of $2.4 million in the period.
For the year, the company reported that its loss narrowed to $10.7 million, or 72 cents per share. Revenue was reported as $14.5 million.
The company's shares closed at $1.31. A year ago, they were trading at $1.62.
